hero.name: <João Pedro/>
hero.title: Project Engineering Intern
hero.subtitle: Computer Engineering student at Instituto Federal Fluminense, passionate about software development, data, and automation. Currently interning at TechnipFMC.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a Computer Engineering student at Instituto Federal Fluminense in Brazil, driven by a strong interest in the dynamic world of software development and data engineering. My journey began with foundational programming concepts, and since then, I've cultivated a passion for creating efficient and innovative solutions.
about.paragraph2: Currently, I'm gaining valuable hands-on experience as a Project Engineering Intern at TechnipFMC, where I contribute to the project management administration (PMA) sector. My role involves automating complex tasks, managing large data volumes, and optimizing workflows. With advanced English proficiency, I am able to navigate technical documentation and collaborate in professional environments to drive impactful results.
about.location: Campos dos Goytacazes, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

jobs.title: Project Engineering
jobs.location: São João da Barra, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil · Hybrid
responsibilities: Development and implementation of automation solutions for complex processes and efficient large-volume data management are key responsibilities, utilizing Python, VBA, and Oracle Database. These initiatives aim to reduce task execution time and increase data accuracy, contributing to operational efficiency.

Creation and maintenance of dashboards and interactive analytical tools are performed using Microsoft Power BI and Microsoft Power Apps. Both tools are excellent for strategic decision-making and the continuous improvement of workflows.

Active support in project execution is provided through the application of Project Management principles to ensure deadlines are met and high-quality standards are maintained. Collaboration in identifying and resolving technical and operational challenges ensures the effective progress of projects.
My C1 English skills are utilized for analyzing technical documentation and for effective communication with the company's global teams, facilitating alignment across the entire projects sector.
Contribution to the organization and sharing of project information is made by using platforms such as Microsoft SharePoint and Microsoft Office tools, optimizing team collaboration and efficiency.

details.Python: Experience in developing automation scripts and data processing solutions. Used in academic projects and for task automation at TechnipFMC.
details.Java: Solid foundation in Object-Oriented Programming. Developed academic projects and have knowledge of core Java concepts.
details.HTML5: Proficient in creating structured and semantic web pages. Used in all my personal web projects.
details.JavaScript: Extensive experience in creating dynamic and interactive web applications. Used with React to build this portfolio.
details.CSS3: Skilled in styling modern and responsive websites, with knowledge of Flexbox, Grid, and animations.
details.React: Developed single-page applications, including this portfolio. Proficient with hooks, components, and state management.
details.OracleDB: Experience with SQL queries and database management from my internship at TechnipFMC.
details.VSCode: My primary code editor for all development, configured with extensions for optimal productivity.
details.Git: Proficient in version control for collaborative and personal projects. Daily use of commands and workflows.
details.GitHub: Used as a platform for hosting repositories, collaboration, and showcasing my projects.
details.PowerBI: Created interactive dashboards and reports for data visualization and analysis at TechnipFMC.
details.SharePoint: Used for document management and team collaboration during my internship.
details.Office: Advanced user of the Microsoft Office suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) for various professional and academic tasks.
